data.title: Blank Word Puzzle
data.solution:
solution = input()
n = int(input())
assert n == len(solution)
answers = [input() for _ in range (n)]
indexes = [word.find(letter) for word, letter in zip(answers, solution)]
shift = max(indexes)
for word, index in zip(answers, indexes):
    assert len(set(word)) == len(word)
    output = ['_'] * len(word)
    output[index] = 'O'
    print(' ' * (shift - index) + ''.join(output))
data.statement:
You're given every [[answer]] to a <<word metapuzzle>> where one column of letters from the answers spells another word. <<Draw the blank puzzle>> with circles (capital {{O}}) for this vertical [[solution]] and otherwise underscores ({{_}}) in place of letters.

For example, imagine the overall solution is {{win}} and the horizontal answers are {{growth}}, {{life}}, and {{son}} in that order. Then the completed puzzle shown below on the left has the initial blank view on the right.
`
gro(w)th     ___O__
  l(i)fe       _O__
 so(n)        __O`
To match the output, left align the empty puzzle with spaces as padding only where needed. Do not include any trailing spaces.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You're given every answer to a word metapuzzle where one column of letters from the answers spells another word. Draw the blank puzzle with circles (capital O) for this vertical solution and otherwise underscores (_) in place of letters.

For example, imagine the overall solution is win and the horizontal answers are growth, life, and son in that order. Then the completed puzzle shown below on the left has the initial blank view on the right.

gro(w)th     ___O__
  l(i)fe       _O__
 so(n)        __O

To match the output, left align the empty puzzle with spaces as padding only where needed. Do not include any trailing spaces.
Input
Line 1: A string solution for the vertical word
Line 2: An integer N for the number of rows (and length of solution)
Next N lines: A string answer for the corresponding row
Output
N lines: The blanks of the puzzle using leading spaces, _, and a single capital O per line
Constraints
N < 10
All letters in input are lowercase.
There are no double letters in horizontal answer words.
Example
Input
win
3
growth
life
son
Output
___O__
  _O__
 __O
